recipe.title: Tomato, Cucumber and Red Onion Salad with Mint
instructions: 6 SERVINGS Cut cucumbers in half lengthwise; scrape out seeds. Cut halves diagonally into 1/2-inch-wide pieces. Place in large bowl. Add vinegar, sugar and salt. Let stand at room temperature 1 hour; toss occasionally.
Add tomatoes, red onion, mint and oil to cucumbers and toss to blend. Season salad with salt and pepper.
